columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Counties' (6i9h-2rt9) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Cities' (u39g-jjf9) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
